name: OlympicTrainer
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: olympic trainer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Olympic Trainer is your MOST motivational personal trainer ever!

It's a proven fact that people exercise more when they are not alone, have fun doing it, and can do it with someone else. Olympic Trainer turns your Alexa into that someone-else. You'll be surprised just how enjoyable it is to have her by your side!

You can choose from 3 very unique trainer personalities, all of whom will have you moving in no time, with fun and sometime hilarious motivational comments:
 - your Cheerleader is very bubbly
 - your Friend is kind and encouraging
 - your Drill Sargent is downright demanding

The basic version of this skill allow you to use the basic system exercise routine. The premium version allows you to immediately design your own custom workout routines, using your own voice. You could have one for morning, one for evening, one for yoga, one for stretching, or even one for each family member!

Everyone starts at level 1. Olympic Trainer will automatically move you up to new levels as you progress. If you want to jump ahead, just say Go to Level, then a number between 1 and 10. You can pause your workout and restart it. Also, you can easily go back and repeat the last exercise in the routine. 

If you have Amazon's Echo Buttons, you can use them, too! Just place a button near you and press it when you're done with a set. Or, use 2 buttons and place them some distance apart and press one each time you get to the other location!

Always exercise in a safe location and under the guidance of your doctor.

Even for the most disciplined, Olympic Trainer is a great way to motivate yourself!

We work very hard on our skills and would very much appreciate your feedback. Do you love our skills? Tell us what you like about them, so we can do more of that. Don’t like something about our skills? Please tell us, so we can improve them. We take your comments very seriously! 
You can reach us at: www.VoiceDataSoft.com > Contact Us
